articles.author: Grant Edwards
articles.title: BMW returns to the original performance flavour - Daily Mercury
articles.description: After a diversion from the native recipe, BMW has rediscovered its performance mojo with the 3 Series.
articles.content:
Once BMWs bread and butter, the 3 Series of the new millennium had a tendency to be bland.
Good to drive, yes. Hard to fault, absolutely. But there was little to inspire or excite.
The compact sedan was lost in a sea of SUVs and swoopy-backed offshoots.
Gl… [+4988 chars]

articles.description: Indulge in a little nostalgia as Game Show features music from new revitalisations of video games from the 90s and early 2000s.
articles.content:
The 1990s featured many games still beloved and celebrated today for their compelling stories, memorable gameplay, and incredible soundtracks.
